services.title: Areas of Practice
services.subtitle: I give you the best in all the services below

tools.label: Mortgage Calculator
tools.desc: Calculate your monthly mortgage payments based on your loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.

tools.label: Land Transfer Tax Calculator
tools.desc: Estimate the land transfer tax you need to pay when purchasing property in Ontario and other provinces.

tools.label: Title Search
tools.desc: Search land and property records in Ontario to verify legal ownership and other title-related details.

tools.label: Child Support Calculator
tools.desc: Use the Federal Child Support Guidelines to estimate child support payments based on income and custody.

tools.label: Spousal Support Calculator
tools.desc: Estimate spousal support payments based on the income of both parties and duration of the relationship.

tools.label: Divorce Application
tools.desc: Find resources and forms to apply for a divorce in Canada, including eligibility and filing steps.

tools.label: Landlord and Tenant Board Forms
tools.desc: Access forms and guidelines related to rental disputes, lease agreements, and tenancy issues in Ontario.

tools.label: Study Permit Application
tools.desc: Learn how to apply for a Canadian study permit to attend schools and universities in Canada.

tools.label: Work Permit Application
tools.desc: Find information on applying for a temporary work permit in Canada, including required documents and timelines.

tools.label: Canadian Citizenship Application
tools.desc: Apply for Canadian citizenship by completing the online or paper application form and meeting residency requirements.

blogs.title: How to Choose the Right Real Estate Lawyer
blogs.excerpt: Learn what to look for when hiring a real estate lawyer, including experience, fees, and client reviews.

blogs.title: Child Custody and Support in Ontario
blogs.excerpt: Understand the laws and guidelines for child custody and support in Ontario, including parental rights and obligations.

blogs.title: How to Evict a Tenant in Ontario
blogs.excerpt: Follow the legal process to evict a tenant in Ontario, including serving notices, filing applications, and attending hearings.

blogs.title: Applying for a Work Permit in Canada
blogs.excerpt: Find out how to apply for a work permit in Canada, including eligibility requirements, application forms, and processing times.

blogs.title: How to Sponsor a Family Member to Canada
blogs.excerpt: Learn about the process of sponsoring a family member to Canada, including eligibility criteria, application forms, and timelines.
